Server-Side_Rendering.description: Renders pages on the server at request time, improving performance and SEO.

Static_Site_Generation.description: Generates HTML at build time, allowing static pages to be served efficiently.

API_Routes.description: Enables the creation of API endpoints directly within the Next.js application.

Automatic_Code_Splitting.description: Automatically splits the code at the page level to reduce initial page load size.

Dynamic_Routing.description: Enables dynamic routes based on filename patterns in the `pages` directory.

Image_Optimization.description: Optimizes images on demand for faster load times and better performance.

Fast_Refresh.description: Provides an improved development experience with instant updates as code changes.

File-based_Routing.description: Automatically creates routes based on the file structure within the `pages` directory.
benefits: No need for additional routing configuration

CSS_and_SASS_Support.description: Built-in support for CSS and SASS modules, allowing scoped and modular styling.

Incremental_Static_Regeneration.description: Updates static content in the background without rebuilding the entire site.

Built-in_TypeScript_Support.description: Seamless integration with TypeScript for type safety and better developer experience.

Middleware_Support.description: Allows executing code before a request is completed, for things like authentication and redirects.

Hybrid_Rendering.description: Combines static generation and server-side rendering within the same application.

Automatic_Image_Optimization.description: Optimizes images on-demand with automatic resizing, format conversion, and lazy loading.
